name: The Mountain (CadavrExquisStudio)
description:
Jeu développé au cours de la Gamejam de l'Université de Montréal du 18 au 20 novembre 2022 avec le thème de la Rédemption.

Game developped during a Gamejam organized by the University of Montreal between November 18 and 20th in 2022 with "Redemption" as the theme.

Gabriel Adam: Programmation, Level design
https://linktr.ee/gamedev.gabe
Maude Desrochers: Art, Animation
https://linktr.ee/mauillustration
William Plante-Tremblay: Programmation, Narrative design, Cinematics
(itch: @willplay)
Xavier Corriveau-Paradis: Audio
https://linktr.ee/xavier.corriveau_paradis
(itch: @GoudreGames) 
Nathan Bourdeau: Level design
